text: PEMT may refer to: *Phosphatidyl ethanolamine methyltransferase, an enzyme encoded by the PEMT gene *Phosphatidylethanolamine N-methyltransferase, an enzyme important to glycine, serine, threonine, and glycerophospholipid metabolism *Polymorphic epithelial mucin, a mucin encoded by the MUC1 gene in humans *Post-edited machine translation, whereby humans amend machine- generated translation to achieve an acceptable final product
title: PEMT
